txt.en: The pipeweed vendor is nearly out of pipeweed! Longo Burrow is the main supplier for the Farmers Faire, so it is time to make a trip to restock.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends. </rgb>

'This is terrible, just terrible! We are all out of pipeweed. Head to Longo Burrow's Farm to find another basket for the market and bring it back as quickly as you can.\n\n'Here...take this pie. It uses my great grand-mother's secret recipe, and it is said to lend you incredible speed when you take a bite of it. Hurry now. Do not tarry!'
Longo Burrow's Farm is in Tookland, just south of Bywater in the Shire.\n\nYou should run to the Longo Burrow's Farm and return with a basket of pipeweed before the time runs out.
'Hurray, [placeholder]! You are the hero of the Farmers Faire!'

Sperling Took, the supplier of the Farmers Faire, can be found in Bywater.\n\nYou should return to Bywater as quickly as you can, taking bites of the pie to help you along if you find yourself needing a burst of energy.
'Hurry, [placeholder]! This is not the time to dilly-dally so!'
Collect the basket of pipeweed (eat pie for a burst of energy)
Carry the basket of pipeweed to the Farmers Market
To Longo Burrow's Farm: Restocking the Pipeweed
